entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to escape with his friends.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is helping him in their escape.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who is using her magical skills to help them.

entities.name: bogrod
entities.description: A goblin who is being controlled by Harry through his wand.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A person whose wand is used by Hermione to cast a spell.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is leading Harry and his friends through the passage.

relationships.description: Harry has control over Bogrod's actions, as evidenced by Bogrod submitting to Harry's will.
Hermione is using Bellatrix's wand to cast a spell.
Harry and his friends are following Griphook through the passage.
Ron is carrying a leather bag of metal tools.
